title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Park Operating Hours: The Park hours are as follows: Park opens at 7 AM   Park closes 15 minutes after Sunset For current park hours, please call the visitor center at (808) 328-2326 ext 1702 The Visitor Center is open from 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM daily.
